sn45.25:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a good person.
sn45.25:1.4: And what is a bad person?
sn45.25:1.5: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
sn45.25:1.6: This is called a bad person.
sn45.25:2.1: And what is a good person?
sn45.25:2.2: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.25:2.3: This is called a good person.”
